column3: Each one of us is an outlet to God and an inlet to God.
Cast your cares on God; that anchor holds.
We are made to know and love God.
Adoration is caring for God above all else.
The world sees in our conduct, in our behaviour, the proof that we are the real children of God.
They always win who side with God.
God is one, greatest of gods and men, not like mortals in body or thought.
Nobody talks so constantly about God as those who insist that there is no God.
My walk on the moon lasted three days. My walk with God will last forever.
God made the world round so we would never be able to see too far down the road.
A thick skin is a gift from God.
The Bible is not man's word about God, but God's word about man.
